sentences.sContent: His new play, Arcadia, is as intricate, elaborate and allusive as anything he has yet written.
sentences.sCn: 他的新剧本《阿卡狄亚》是他迄今为止创作的最错综复杂、煞费苦心和让人琢磨不定的。

remMethod.val: allu(=allude 暗指) + sive → 暗指的

words.tran: 暗指，转弯抹角地说到；略为提及，顺便提到

trans.tranCn: 暗指的， 间接提到的
trans.tranOther: Allusive speech, writing, or art is full of indirect references to people or things
